# Movie Recommendation System

## Description
Content-based filtering using cosine similarity on movie metadata. Frontend using Streamlit.

## Tech Stack
- Python
- Pandas, NumPy
- Scikit-learn
- Matplotlib/Seaborn
- Streamlit (if applicable)

## Features
- Data cleaning & preprocessing
- Model training & evaluation
- Visualization

## How to Run
```bash
python main.py
```
